name: Calafant Pirate Ship
description:
The Calafant Pirate Ship is the terror of the seas but very easy to assemble – you don't even need to use glue or scissors. It's made from sturdy, high-quality cardboard, with all the pieces pre-cut and pre-punched so all you have to do is slot them together. Once you've made your pirate ship and treasure chest, you can paint and decorate them however you like, then you're ready to set sail for hours of creative and imaginative play. The Pirate Ship is suitable for children aged four and up. 

46.5 x 18.5 x 45.5cm when built. 

Includes: White cardboard with printed lines, 12 felt markers

name: Calafant Treehouse
description:
Build & Decorate your own Treehouse Kit

A fantastic kit to get creative and create your own treehouse!  With the illustrated manual the assembling of all CALAFANT models is very easy - due to the slot-in system, no glue and tools are necessary.

Decorate it with poster paints as in the picture or do YOUR own thing! You can even glue on real leaves, moss and bark for a realistic effect. Try applying snow-like cotton wool and lots of glitter for a more wintery look!

Assembly Required – slots together with NO glue!

Finished size: L: 38 x W: 41.5 x H: 57cm

Material: White Cardboard. 

Suitable for Ages: 36 Months – 18 Years

name: Calafant Horse Drawn Carriage
description:
Product Description

CALAFANT is solely focused on a child's need for creative play. The company has the extremely sturdy, yet light and flexible cardboard material specially produced to ensure high quality for children to freely decorate and safely play. CALAFANT knows that kids like to transport or even throw and push the toys, and the special cardboard allows them to do that without the toys being easily damaged. Many small details reveal the great thought that went into the development of each model. With the included illustrated instructions, the toys can be built without glue easily, thanks to a clever fold-and-slot system.

CALAFANT pays close attention to ensure that there are no sharp edges or pointy bits. Since play and storage space is often an issue, each toy can be folded away for storage and, once the child has outgrown or outplayed it, it can be recycled instead of being thrown away and sent to a landfill.

Product Description

Perfect for any child who loves to build and paint, this Horse Drawn Carriage model is easy to assemble without the need for scissors or glue! With its clever slotting system, your little prince or princess can build and decorate it to suit their own imaginations. The set includes six non-toxic pens for safe-play and would make a fantastic rainy day activity. Creative play is also great for developing fine motor skills and encouraging a growing imagination. Made from 100% biodegradable materials, this eco-friendly model has been built to endure active imaginations, includes a set of illustrated instructions and is sure to keep any child entertained for hours on end. 

Product dimensions: 20.3 x 25.4 x 10.2 cm

name: Calafant Fire Engine
description:
Product Description

CALAFANT is solely focused on a child's need for creative play. The company has the extremely sturdy, yet light and flexible cardboard material specially produced to ensure high quality for children to freely decorate and safely play. CALAFANT knows that kids like to transport or even throw and push the toys, and the special cardboard allows them to do that without the toys being easily damaged. Many small details reveal the great thought that went into the development of each model. With the included illustrated instructions, the toys can be built without glue easily, thanks to a clever fold-and-slot system.

CALAFANT pays close attention to ensure that there are no sharp edges or pointy bits. Since play and storage space is often an issue, each toy can be folded away for storage and, once the child has outgrown or outplayed it, it can be recycled instead of being thrown away and sent to a landfill.

Product Description

If your little one loves arts and crafts, this exciting Fire Engine from Calafant would be an ideal addition to their play-room. Made from durable cardboard to withstand even the most energetic young imagination, this super fire engine model is super easy to assemble without the need for glue or scissors. Little ones can decorate their own fire engine with the six non-toxic pens provided before engaging in hours of fun as the town hero! Recommended for ages 4 and up, this model toy is perfect for a rainy day activity and great for developing motor skills. It would make a fantastic addition to any play-room or a thoughtful and entertaining gift for a loved one.

Product dimensions: 20.3 x 25.4 x 10.2 cm

name: Paperpod Toy Fort
description:

description:
Wow, your own aeroplane to decorate and fly off somewhere in!

The kit consists of 6 die-cut corrugated cardboard components (approx 80% recycled) that easily fasten together, without fixings or adhesive. No tools or special skills required to assemble!

Assembled size (WxDxH): 1340x780x250mm
Packaged dimensions: 72.5x46.5x4cm
Packaged weight: 1.4kg

Recommended age: 18mths+

name: Kid-Eco Puppet Theatre
description:
This lovely puppet theatre kit consists of 2 die-cut corrugated cardboard components that easily fasten together, without fixings or adhesives, to form the puppet theatre.

No tools or special skills are required for construction. Full assembly instructions are provided.

Recommended age 18 months +

Assembled size (W x D x H): 101 x 47 x 141.5 cm

Kid-Eco products conform to the 88/378/EEC safety directive and are designed and manufactured in the UK to the following National & European Standards: BS EN 71 - 1:1998 - Safety of toys - Physical & Mechanical properties BS EN 71 - 2:1994.

Manufactured from (approximately) 80% recycled corrugated cardboard.

Each puppet theatre comes flat-packed in a reusable sturdy corrugated cardboard box with removable lid.

Packaged dimensions (W x D x H): 112.6 x 104.4 x 5.5 cm
Packaged weight: 4.65 kg

name: Kid-Eco Princess Palace
description:
This kit consists of 24 die-cut corrugated cardboard components that easily fasten together, without fixings or adhesives, to form the princess palace illustrated above.

No tools or special skills are required for construction. Full assembly instructions are provided.

Assembled size (W x D x H): 164 x 164 x 185 cm

Packaging
Each princess palace comes flat-packed in 2 reusable sturdy corrugated cardboard boxes with removable lids.
Overall Packaged dimensions (W x D x H): 112.6 x 104.4 x 11 cm
Packaged weight: 15.5 kg

Safety & Quality
Recommended age 18 months + Kid-Eco products conform to the 88/378/EEC safety directive and are designed and manufactured in the UK to the following National & European Standards:
BS EN 71 - 1:1998 - Safety of toys - Physical & Mechanical properties BS EN 71 - 2:1994 - Safety of toys - Flammability Profiled ‘safety edges’ have been applied wherever practical on this product.

Environment
Manufactured from (approximately) 80% recycled corrugated cardboard. Biodegradable & fully recyclable.

Important note
This item is primarily designed for indoor use but is suitable for outside use in dry and calm conditions. When not in use it should be stored in a dry place and kept away from excessive heat or naked flame. Adult supervision is required at all times. This princess palace playhouse should be inspected regularly before, during and after use for any signs of damage which could cause potential injury. This product should be kept out of the reach of very young children and only be used under the direct supervision of an adult.

name: Kid-Eco Fortress

Assembled size (W x D x H): 164 x 164 x 108 cm	

Overall Packaged dimensions (W x D x H): 112.6 x 104.4 x 11 cm

Packaged weight: 13.2 kg

Biodegradable & fully recyclable. Manufactured from (approximately) 80% recycled corrugated cardboard.

Products conform to the 88/378/EEC safety directive and are designed and manufactured in the UK to the following National & European Standards: BS EN 71 - 1:1998 - Safety of toys - Physical & Mechanical properties BS EN 71 - 2:1994 - Safety of toys - Flammability Profiled ‘safety edges’ have been applied wherever practical on this product.

Recommended age 18 months +

name: Kid-Eco Large Cardboard Castle
description:
Environmentally friendly large cardboard castle playhouse.

The Large Castle Playhouse comprises 2 castle turrets with Garrison wall between. Supplied in a sturdy corrugated cardboard outer for storage when not in use. 

Overall Size:
2210 x 520 x 1080 mm (87" x 21" x 43")

Packaged Size:
1380 x 1140 x 80 mm (54" x 45" x 3")

Packaged Weight: 7.6 kg

Can be over painted & decorated as required. Contains approx 80% recycled cardboard. Fully recyclable and biodegradable.

Other colours available: white, pink & silver grey. Please email info@redjellykids.co.uk to ask for pricing.

name: Painting or cooking smock
description:
These gorgeous red and white gingham painting smocks, as seen at the popular Red Jelly creative play classes and parties, are now available to buy! 

Smocks are 100% cotton and made lovingly for children to wear with comfort. Say goodbye to starchy, plastic aprons and hello to soft, easy-to-wear gorgeousness!

With softly elasticated wrists and neck, the smocks are easy to put on and take off. Then just sling them in the washing machine to freshen up.

Two sizes are available, 1-3 years & 3-6 years.

name: Red Jelly CD
description:
*NEW* original music for children to play along to.

12 songs are based on the themes from the popular Red Jelly classes and parties and include the following tracks:

- The Red Jelly song
- Hero
- Dinosaurumpus
- Going on a Journey
- Where are you Bear?
- The Farm
- Autumn Leaves
- Under the Sea
- Choo Choo Train
- Puppet Show Time
- Glitzy Christmas
- Tidy Up Time
